ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Optical Mesosphere Thermosphere Imagers (OMTI) All-sky imager at Gakona, Alaska, US
ResourceHeader.Description: The multi-wavelength, all-sky imager at Gakona, Alaska, US of the Optical Mesosphere Thermosphere Imagers (OMTIs). The OMTIs were developed at the Institute for Space-Earth Environmental Research, Nagoya University, in order to investigate the dynamics of the upper atmosphere through nocturnal airglow emissions.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the principal investigator (PI) of the OMTIs, Prof. K. Shiokawa (shiokawa at isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) before using the data.
